WndProperty.Name: prpVoiceClimbRate
WndProperty.Caption: Climb Rate
WndProperty.Help: Enable voice read-back of the average climb rate when circling.

WndProperty.Name: prpVoiceTerrain
WndProperty.Caption: Terrain
WndProperty.Help: Enable warnings for final glide through terrain.

WndProperty.Name: prpVoiceWaypointDistance
WndProperty.Caption: Waypoint Distance
WndProperty.Help: Enable voice read-back of the distance to next waypoint when in cruise mode.

WndProperty.Name: prpVoiceTaskAltitudeDifference
WndProperty.Caption: Task Altitude Difference
WndProperty.Help: Enable voice read-back of height above/below final glide when in final glide.

WndProperty.Name: prpVoiceMacCready
WndProperty.Caption: MacCready
WndProperty.Help: Enable voice read-back of MacReady setting after it is adjusted.

WndProperty.Name: prpVoiceNewWaypoint
WndProperty.Caption: New Waypoint
WndProperty.Help: Enable voice announcement that the task waypoint has changed.

WndProperty.Name: prpVoiceInSector
WndProperty.Caption: In Sector
WndProperty.Help: Enable voice announcement that the glider is within the task observation sector.

WndProperty.Name: prpVoiceAirspace
WndProperty.Caption: Airspace
WndProperty.Help: Enable voice warnings for airspace incursions.
